scripts.css: mkdir -p dist/style && lessc app/src/style/style.less dist/style/style.css && lessc --clean-css dist/style/style.css dist/style/style.min.css && rm dist/style/style.css
scripts.img: echo '=> copying the assets' && mkdir -p dist/img && cp app/images/* dist/img/
scripts.minify: babili dist/js/main.js > dist/js/main.min.js && rm dist/js/main.js && mv dist/js/main.min.js dist/js/main.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run html && npm run css && npm run js && npm run bootstrap && npm run img
